definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)

sentences.english: Remain youth, happy good luck, happy peace and health, the spirit delectation.
sentences.chinese: 青春永驻，幸福吉祥，快乐安康，精神愉快。

sentences.english: She is the woman who found the secret to eternal youth.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个懂得如何保持青春永驻的女人。

sentences.english: Discover the mystery of Oil of Olay and discover younger looks at every age.
sentences.chinese: 探索玉兰油的神奇，探索你青春永驻的奥秘。

sentences.english: Sincerely wish him eternal youth, art epistemic.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝愿他青春永驻，艺术尝新。

sentences.english: It also means you'll remain young just as you got married.
sentences.chinese: 这个字还意味着你们永远如新婚般青春永驻。

definition: to recover one's youthful vigor/to feel rejuvenated (idiom)
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
to age/to deteriorate with age/old and weak
to seem to grow younger/to regain one's youthful looks
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
